sentences.sContent: " Montaigne gives a similar example, saying that if you put a sage on the edge of a precipice, "he must shudder like a child.
sentences.sContent_eng: " Montaigne gives a similar example, saying that if you put a sage on the edge of a precipice, "he must shudder like a child.
sentences.sCn: 蒙田举了个类似的例子，说如果你把一个圣人放在悬崖边上，“他一定像个孩子一样发抖”。
